Package index

Run & scenarios

run_scenarios()
Run a batch of Management Strategy Evaluation (MSE) scenarios
run_model()
Run Management Strategy Evaluation (MSE) simulation
build_config()
Build a ready-to-run config for run_model()
.select_scenarios()
Select scenarios to run Filter the package's built-in scenarios table using a single selector argument.
param_configs
Built-in parameter profiles (param_configs)
scenarios
Scenarios list

Assessment methods (TRM / DLM / YPR)

Utilities & converters

convert_legacy_to_ssi()
Convert a legacy Ohlberger .RData environment to a package-compliant ssi_run object.
make_figures()
Build Selected Figures from an ssi_run
